input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item keywords and item specification.

Item specification:
Schleich Princess

Item keywords:
Perfect addition to your Knights Collection
Hand painted
Highly detailed
input_text.Response A: The Schleich Princess is a perfect addition to your Knights Collection, with excellent hand painting and highly detailed features. This toy is sure to be a hit with children who love to play with knights and princesses. She is expertly crafted and made of the highest quality, durable materials. The Schleich Princess will make an excellent gift for any child who loves creative play.
input_text.Response B: I think that’s a Schleich Princess.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

label_annotations.factors_a: A search via Google allowed me to check the item and gain some understanding
